EmailTemplate.name: Global_Webinar_Cote-Pivotal/Constellation Research_Q316.Reminder 8-30-16
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar reminder - How important is Platform and Cloud Portability
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://pivotal.io/platform/webinar/platform-and-cloud-portability]]> Thank you for registering for tomorrow's webinar How important is Platform and Cloud Portability? Please see event details below:
Date: Wednesday, August 31, 2016 Time: 11:00AM PDT Join the Session <[[http://event.on24.com/wcc/r/1214170/C6B8CFA600BDB99F391C4363E7217E36]]>
Audio Information: This webinar will be streaming live via your computer speakers. {{my.Save the Date:default=Save the Date}}
We look forward to you joining us!
The Pivotal Team
